Sql.query: select vergrpcodi, vergrpnomb from prn_versiongrp where vergrpcodi = :vergrpcodi
insert into prn_versiongrp( vergrpcodi, vergrpnomb, vergrpareausuaria ) values( :vergrpcodi, :vergrpnomb, :vergrpareausuaria )
update prn_versiongrp set vergrpnomb = :vergrpnomb where vergrpcodi = :vergrpcodi
select vergrpcodi, vergrpnomb from prn_versiongrp where vergrpnomb = :vergrpnomb

select distinct vgrp.vergrpcodi, vgrp.vergrpnomb from prn_mediciongrp mgrp right join prn_versiongrp vgrp on vgrp.vergrpcodi = mgrp.vergrpcodi where mgrp.medifecha between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY')
select vergrpcodi, vergrpnomb from prn_versiongrp where vergrpareausuaria = '{0}'

select distinct vgrp.vergrpcodi, vgrp.vergrpnomb from dpo_medicion96 med96 right join prn_versiongrp vgrp on vgrp.vergrpcodi = med96.vergrpcodi and (vgrp.vergrpareausuaria = '{0}') where med96.dpomedfecha between to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{2}','DD/MM/YYYY')
select vergrpcodi, vergrpnomb from prn_versiongrp where vergrpnomb = '{0}' and vergrpareausuaria = '{1}'
